data: {"generalSituation":"The northeast monsoon will reach the coast of southern China later today. Temperatures will fall slightly and the weather will be dry over the region over the weekend. Under the influence of a replenishment of the monsoon, it will be windy over the coast of Guangdong early next week. Besides, an area of low pressure is expected to develop gradually over the western North Pacific to the east of the Philippines during the weekend to early next week, with a higher chance of moving across the Philippines and entering the central and southern parts of the South China Sea midweek next week, moving towards the vicinity of Vietnam.","weatherForecast":[{"forecastDate":"20251031","week":"Friday","forecastWind":"Northeast force 2 to 3.","forecastWeather":"Sunny periods.
